content:
After finding a recent bug introduced in the .NET client I'm re-examining the implementation of the _summary and specifically where the SUBSETTED Tag goes for searches.
http://hl7.org/fhir/search.html#summary
Each item in the bundle I was expecting to have a SUBSETTED meta tag, but wondering if the bundle itself needed one?
I'm assuming no Tag on the Search bundle itself, just the items.

After finding a recent bug introduced in the .NET client I'm re-examining the implementation of the _summary and specifically where the SUBSETTED Tag goes for searches.
http://hl7.org/fhir/search.html#summary
Each item in the bundle I was expecting to have a SUBSETTED meta tag, but wondering if the bundle itself needed one?

To avoid confusion: this bug is only present in the latest source code, which Brian uses on his projects, not in the binaries you'd find on NuGet....
I thought that got into the last release, must only be in the develop (which I'm working from yes)
